description: Nintendo has officially locked in a launch date for the Nintendo Switch 2, its successor to the extremely popular Nintendo Switch. That name, though, could have been a little bit different, if not for a piece of Nintendo's past.

description: The globe-trotting World of Assassination trilogy of IO Interactive's Hitman series is coming to the Nintendo Switch 2 as Hitman World of Assassination - Signature Edition. And alongside arriving in the Switch 2 launch window, Agent 47 will also be donning some new, appropriately Nintendo-themed duds.
title: Hitman World of Assassination - Signature Edition Has Mario and Luigi-Themed Pre-Order Bonuses on Nintendo Switch 2

description: In lists published to the official Nintendo website, the company has revealed which OG Switch games have "start up issues" on Nintendo Switch 2, and which games can start up but have "some in-game compatibility issues."
title: Here's Every Nintendo Switch Game With Compatibility Issues on Nintendo Switch 2

description: During today's Nintendo Direct, Square Enix popped in to announce that Bravely Default is getting a remaster for Nintendo Switch 2. It's called Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD, and it's coming to the console at launch on June 5.
title: Bravely Default: Flying Fairy HD Remaster Announced for Nintendo Switch 2

description: Confirmed compatibility.

description: Team Cherry showed up for a few seconds of today’s Nintendo Switch 2 Direct to reveal that its long-awaited follow-up, Hollow Knight: Silksong, has nailed down a 2025 release window.

description: Did you know Nintendo has had this many consoles?

description: If you, like many of us, thought that Nintendo was finally winding down its ongoing production of tiny plastic figures with real yet negligible functionality in its video games with the release of its next console, think again. The Nintendo Switch 2 isn't just compatible with old amiibo, Nintendo seems to be committed to still making new ones.
title: Nintendo Will Keep Making Amiibo for Nintendo Switch 2, Starting With Tears of the Kingdom, Street Fighters Figures

description: The Nintendo Switch 2 arrives on June 5, 2025, and it will likely be a hot commodity when it launches. Over on the official Nintendo store, the company is implementing some pre-order measures to ensure bona fide Switch players are getting their pre-orders.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preorders Get Some Nintendo Store Restrictions, Presumably to Thwart Scalpers

description: Switch 2 will only support MicroSD Express cards, which are available now and starting at $45 for 128GB.

description: Tomb Raider 1–3 Remastered, Dredge, Aliens Dark Descent and more PC games are available as part of the Humble Choice for April 2025.

description: The most surprising reveal of the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct might have been a third-party game. Announced near the end of the showcase, FromSoftware is developing a brand-new game called The Duskbloods, which has some striking similarities to the beloved PlayStation 4-exclusive Bloodborne.
title: Bloodborne Fans React to Nintendo Switch 2 Exclusive The Duskbloods

description: Whether you play Switch games in handheld or console mode, these are the best controllers for Nintendo's latest system.

description: As of April 2, INIU power banks are on sale from $15.99 at Amazon. Save up to 36% on models up to 25,000mAh. Also, get Dead Cells for 50% off at Humble and preorder the Metaphor: ReFantazio Gallica statue for $129.99 at the IGN Store.
title: The Best Deals Today: INIU Power Banks, Steam Deck Games, and a ReFantazio Statue

description: Nintendo has announced the Switch 2 Welcome Tour, a special game launching alongside the Switch 2 to take you on a guided tour of its new hardware. Surprisingly, though, it's not a pack-in piece of software, but a separate, paid digital game.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour Will Be a Paid Tour of Your New Nintendo Switch 2

description: Mario Kart world costs $79.99, but it's $30 cheaper if you buy it bundled with the Nintendo Switch 2.

description: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders start April 9 ahead of its June 5, 2025, launch for $449.99. A $499.99 Mario Kart World bundle is also available, and you can register your interest now for a chance to receive an invite to preorder from My Nintendo Store.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preorders Officially Start on April 9

description: Amazon has dropped Xbox 1TB Expansion Cards to just £99.99 in the UK, the lowest price ever on the proprietary expandable storage.
